thread.title: Giggles N' Hugs Appoints Former CFO Of California Pizza Kitchen As New CEO And Director

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Giggles N' Hugs Appoints Former CFO Of California Pizza Kitchen As New CEO And Director
text: February 28, 2018 / 1:40 PM / in 16 minutes BRIEF-Giggles N' Hugs Appoints Former CFO Of California Pizza Kitchen As New CEO And Director Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 28 (Reuters) - Giggles N’ Hugs Inc: * GIGGLES N’ HUGS APPOINTS FORMER CFO OF CALIFORNIA PIZZA KITCHEN AS THE NEW CEO AND DIRECTOR * GIGGLES N’ HUGS INC - PHILIP GAY HAS ACCEPTED POSITION AS COMPANY‘S CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER EFFECTIVE APRIL 1, 2018 * GIGGLES N’ HUGS INC - JOEY PARSI, CURRENT CEO, WILL BE APPOINTED CHAIRMAN * GIGGLES N’ HUGS INC - GAY WILL ALSO BE NOMINATED TO BOARD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
